i.name: Mark of the Storm
i.description:
Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.

The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

q.name: Thundering Shuriken
q.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

w.name: Electrical Surge
w.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

e.name: Lightning Rush
e.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains defense and movement speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

r.name: Slicing Maelstrom
r.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

i1.blurb: Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy. The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.
description: {{sbc|Mark of the Storm:}} Enemies hit by '''Kennen's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] receive a {{as|Mark of the Storm|buzzword}} for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. At three stacks, the marks consume themselves to {{tip|stun}} the target for {{fd|1.25}} seconds and restore {{tip|energy|{{as|25 energy}}}}.
{{sbc|Diminished Mark:}} If the {{tip|stun}} is applied more than once within 6 seconds, its duration is reduced to {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
i1.name: Mark of the Storm
notes: * '''Kennen''' will still restore energy if the target dies from a third {{as|Mark of the Storm|buzzword}}.

riot.name: Mark of the Storm
riot.description:
Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.

The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

riot.name: Thundering Shuriken
riot.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
riot.tooltip: Throws a shuriken that deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

q1.blurb: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' throws a charged shuriken in a line in front of him, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy it hits.
q1.name: Thundering Shuriken

riot.name: Electrical Surge
riot.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.

Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm or Slicing Maelstrom, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

w1.blurb: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kennen''' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and applies a {{as|Mark of the Storm|buzzword}} once every 5 [[basic attack]]s.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' sends out a surge of electricity to all nearby enemies afflicted by {{as|Mark of the Storm|buzzword}} or caught in {{ai|Slicing Maelstrom|Kennen}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ {{ap|60 to 100}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Electrical Surge
notes: * Basic attacks against [[structures]] do not stack the counter nor do they consume the enhanced attack.
* ''Electrical Surge's'' active will still hit [[stealth]]ed champions as well as those hidden in [[Sight|fog of war]] (revealing their position but not granting {{tip|sight}} of them).
* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Electrical Surge's'' bonus damage.
** The bonus damage apply {{tip|single target}} effect.
* ''Electrical Surge's'' enhanced attack will be consumed and the bonus damage will not be applied if '''Kennen''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Electrical Surge's passive'' cannot be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} but can be {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}.
* {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will destroy the enhanced attack but not consume it.

riot.name: Lightning Rush
riot.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains defense and movement speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.
riot.tooltip:
Kennen turns into a ball of lightning for up to {{ duration - as ball }} seconds, dealing {{ base damage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies he passes through.

While a ball of lightning, Kennen gains {{ defenses }} armor and magic resist, and {{ movement speed*100 }}% movement speed. Kennen is refunded {{ energy refund }} energy if he damages at least one enemy in this form.

Upon returning to his normal form, Kennen gains {{ attack speed*100 }}% attack speed for {{ duration - after ball }} seconds.

Lightning Rush deals {{ damage to minions*100 }}% damage to minions.
Kennen ignores unit collision while he is a ball of lightning.

e1.blurb: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' transforms into a ball of electricity, {{tip|disarm|disarming}} himself but becoming {{tip|ghosted}} and gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|100% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds, while also gaining {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} while active.
'''Kennen''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions and restores {{tip|energy|{{as|40 energy}}}} the first time ''Lightning Rush'' damages an enemy.
'''Kennen''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds upon exiting ''Lightning Rush''.
'''Kennen''' can reactivate ''Lightning Rush'' to prematurely cancel it, allowing him to use [[basic attack]]s again.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|80/2 to 240/2}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Lightning Rush
notes: * ''Lightning Rush'' will only damage any particular enemy once per cast.
* ''Lightning Rush'' can grant '''Kennen''' an effective 230 bonus movement speed (assuming there are no modifiers involved).
* Reactivating ''Lightning Rush'' will not remove the bonus resistances since them and the bonus movement speed are independent of each other.

riot.name: Slicing Maelstrom
riot.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
riot.tooltip:
Summons a magical storm for {{ e3 }} seconds that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies near Kennen every {{ e2 }} seconds. Each maelstrom hit applies Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3.

Successive maelstrom hits against the same enemy deal an additional {{ e4 }}% damage for each hit they've already suffered from this storm.

r1.blurb: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kennen''' summons ''Shuriken Storm'', a magical storm around himself for 3 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within range every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
Each maelstrom hit applies a {{as|Mark of the Storm|buzzword}}, up to a maximum of 3.
''Slicing Maelstrom'' deals 10% increased damage with each successive strike against a target, up to a maximum of 150% damage with one strike.
r1.name: Slicing Maelstrom
notes: * Not being a channeled ability means ''Slicing Maelstrom'' will persist even if '''Kennen''' is disabled, activates {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, or is being revived by {{ii|Guardian Angel}} or {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}.
